mapper.select: SELECT email, password, is_verified AS isVerified, verify_token, reset_password_token FROM facediary_db.user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT email, password, is_verified AS isVerified, verify_token, reset_password_token FROM facediary_db.user WHERE verify_token = #{verifyToken}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facediary_db.user (email, password, verify_token) VALUE (#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyToken, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE facediary_db.user SET is_verified = true, verify_token = null WHERE verify_token = #{verifyToken}
